title: {"title"=>"My First Day At CoderAcademy!"
content: "content"=>"My first day at CoderAcademy was amazing!;I met a lot of cool people and learnt some cool code!;Plus I saw a great presentation!"

title: {"title"=>"The Adventure At Bethany's House"
content: "content"=>"Tonight I am at Bethany's house;We're going to have lots and lots of fun;I can't wait!"

title: {"title"=>"The Best Ice Lolly I've Ever Received"
content: "content"=>"Tonight I had the BEST NIGHT EVER!;Do you want to know why?;My 2nd favourite girlfriend got me the BEST ice lolly ever!;The reason she isn't my first"
mood: "mood"=>" is because my first girlfriend is:;THE ICE LOLLY!"
